member.name: M:API.Controllers.CategoryController.GetCategories(Application.Queries.Category.GetCategories.GetCategoriesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET categories based on previously informeted filters. Required at least a filter as parameters.
member.returns: Return a list of categories based on pre determined filters.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CategoryController.GetCategory(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET category by Id Required an Id as parameter.
member.returns: Return a category based on their Id.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ReceiptController.GetReceipts(Application.Queries.Receipt.GetReceipts.GetReceiptsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET receipts based on previously informeted filters. Required at least a filter as parameters.
member.returns: Return a list of receipts based on pre determined filters.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ReceiptController.GetReceipt(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET receipt by Id Required an Id as parameter.
member.returns: Return a receipt based on their Id.
